entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #48124
  • `_MTPBuild` target is duplicated #48095

Closed

  • Generate a ProjectTypeGuid property for known project types #522
    10.0.1xx
  • `dotnet sln add` not consistently discovering Project Type Guids for unknown project types #47638
  • Potential telemetry cleanup logic error - unsent telemetry events buildup #41796
    Backlog
  • Installer kills software without asking #41815
    Discussion
  • [MAC]The template packages for .NET 10 Preview 3 is incorrect #48061
  • error MSB4062: The "Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.Tasks.ComputeDotnetBaselmageAndTag" task could not be loaded from the assembly C:\Users\x\.nuget\packages\microsoft.net.build.containers\8.0.101\build..'' and other errors #38330
  • Use CDN urls instead of blob.core.windows.net for downloading runtime/aspnetcore assets #47503
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48122
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48121
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Dogfood] Show changes in prompt #48120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make some targets in redist incremental #48102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify logic around _MTPBuild target #48097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • sln-add: Get project DefaultProjectTypeGuid #47661
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 9.0.5
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47514
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47569
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 9.0.106 #48110
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.409 #48109
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.312 #48108
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 8.0.116 #48107
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish productVersion.txt for all repos #48105
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Update branding to 9.0.204 #48111
    Area-Infrastructure, Branding
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add logic to track SBRP project references in the SBRPUsageReport #48104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #48067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use `dotnet/runtime-deps` images instead of `dotnet/nightly/runtime-deps` for AOT #48101
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reuse specific job artifacts in installer test jobs #48074
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • dotnet CLI: Adjust namespaces to match folder layout #48042
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • tool-install: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64]: Add loongarch64 R2R resolve #45236
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Refactor GetPackageNameFromDependency #45873
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Investigate Helix Arm64 timeouts #46243
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • [release/8.0.4xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47475
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE
  • Allow container targets to be loaded in more scenarios, even if the targets will be skipped #47693
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only set DotnetTool package type if no package type is set #48039
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ux for retry in dotnet test #48075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Generate Link elements based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #47915
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [dotnet test for MTP] Throw exception if the project doesn't produce executable #48065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Basic support for launchSettings in the new dotnet test #48063
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the latest application insights #47924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hide stack on WorkloadResolver constructor error #38091
    Area-SdkResolvers
